item.title: The Query String Builder
item.description: I was after a query string builder to support a System.Net.HttpClient that I was building tonight and it was surprising hard to find something that met my needs. After some digging through the Uri source code I decided to knock one up based on the NameValueCollection. public class QueryStringBuilder : NameValueCollection { public QueryStringBuilder() : base(StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) { } public QueryStringBuilder(NameValueCollection collection) : base(StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) { Add(collection); } public QueryStringBuilder(object items) : base(StringComparer.
